items.sentence: I suppose I\'d better be more careful the next time.
I suppose I\'d better go and talk to Tom about that.
Tom isn\'t the type of person I want working for us.
I heard that Tom doesn\'t live in Australia anymore.
I suppose you\'ll need a crowbar to open that crate.
Tom did a good job proofreading Mary\'s rough draft.
I thought you said Tom wasn\'t a member of our club.
I thought you said you didn\'t want to be disturbed.
How do you help someone who doesn\'t want your help?
Tom has told me he has to go to Australia next week.
